docs.snippet: Five former Buffalo Bills cheerleaders on Tuesday sued the team over a pay system they say had them working hundreds of hours for free at games and at mandatory public appearances at which they were subjected to groping and sexual comments, and on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Five former Buffalo Bills cheerleaders on Tuesday sued the team over a pay system they say had them working hundreds of hours for free at games and at mandatory public appearances at which they were subjected to groping and sexual comments, and one said they had to take a jiggle test so their boss could see how firm their bodies were.

headline.main: 5 Former Buffalo Bills Cheerleaders Sue Over Pay
headline.print_headline: 5 Former Buffalo Bills Cheerleaders Sue Over Pay
